ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) jar sliced jalapeno peppers, finely chopped
2 ¼ cups finely chopped walnuts, divided

cookingTips: Let cream cheese soften at room temperature for easier mixing
Chop jalapenos finely and drain excess liquid to prevent the cheese ball from being too wet
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a make-ahead appetizer perfect for parties. Guide the user through forming the cheese ball and rolling it in nuts for presentation.
